sets.tps: 200 HP, 44 En, 200 M Def, 56 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP, 200 Melee Defense, and Robust are to be as Melee bulky as possible 
 56 Ranged Defense is leftovers and improves overall bulk 
 44 Energy = 225 Energy at level 50 for (2 Rejuvenates and 5 of any other move) with Energy Orb and Expertise 
 0 Speed UPs with Sluggish lets it move second so it can  bring in a powerful wallbreaker with Baffle safely
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 200 HP, 44 En, 56 M Def, 200 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP, 200 Ranged Defense, and Clever are to be as Ranged bulky as possible 
 44 Energy = 225 Energy at level 50 for (2 Rejuvenates and 5 of any other move) with Energy Orb and Expertise 
 0 Speed UPs with Sluggish lets it move second so it can bring in a powerful wallbreaker with Baffle safely 
 56 Melee Defense is leftovers and improves overall bulk
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
